name: Messy Room Simulator
description:
Does the process of tidying up room make you feel good or disaster?

There are different styles of rooms in this sandbox game. It may be similar to your room, or it may be a room that does not exist in real world. They have one thing in common: MESSY.

No mission goals, no one stand in your way , only rooms and messy items at your disposal, you can use your imagination to deal with the mess, tidy up the room? Good way! Make the room more messy? Turn it into garbage design? May be ... weird? No problem! It's UP TO YOU!

No matter what you make is beautiful, neat, or a sensational work, share screenshots, see you in the community! ^_^
